channel.title: CVE Feed for Eaton -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Eaton -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-43776|2023-10-17T12:35:09.849Z -- eaton -- easye4
item.description: Eaton easyE4 PLC offers a device password protection functionality to facilitate a secure connection and prevent unauthorized access. It was observed that the device password was stored with a weak encoding algorithm in the easyE4 program file when exported to SD card (*.PRG file ending).

item.title: CVE-2023-43777|2023-10-17T12:49:04.870Z -- eaton -- easysoft
item.description: Eaton easySoft software is used to program easy controllers and displays for configuring, programming and defining parameters for all the intelligent relays. This software has a password protection functionality to secure the project file from unauthorized access. This password was being stored insecurely and could be retrieved by skilled adversaries.Â

item.title: CVE-2023-43775|2023-09-28T20:29:16.284Z -- eaton -- smp%20sg-4260
item.description:
Denial-of-service vulnerability in the web server of the Eaton SMP Gateway allows
attacker to potentially force an unexpected restart of the automation platform, impacting the availability of the product. In rare situations, the issue could cause the SMP device to restart in Safe Mode or Max Safe Mode. When in Max Safe Mode, the product is not vulnerable anymore.
